BBK01.BU1122: Central government debt - Federal savings notes

General: For Germany as a whole (western Germany up to and including 1990) From March 2009, including the debt of the Investment and Repayment Fund. From July 2009, including the debt of the Financial Market Stabilisation Fund (SoFFin).
Comment on 2009-03: On 1 March 2009, central government assumed joint responsibility for the debts of the Investment and Repayment Fund.
Comment on 2009-07: On 1 July 2009, central government assumed joint responsibility for the debts of the Financial Market Stabilisation Fund (SoFFin).
